replies.msg:
2年讀書要求可以加埋你11年前讀完戈個bachelor degree，再加埋你個grad dip + master應該夠2年。

問題係由於你係行Graduate Stream，你要用一個係MLTSSL上既occupation去搞，根據移民局既建議data scientist應該行 ANZSCO 224999 in which 唔係MLTSSL上。
https://immi.homeaffairs.gov.au/what-we-do/skilled-migration-program/skilled-visa-newsletters/september-2019

所以如果你無其他情況，例如工作經驗，的話，我會建議你讀多個IT相關master，以你咁既情況應該可以攞一半credit。

replies.msg:
Approval
You will cease to be an Australian citizen on the day we approve your application.

If you are in Australia when your application is approved, you will automatically become the holder of an ex-citizen visa. No visa application is required.

An ex-citizen visa is a permanent resident visa. It does not allow re-entry into Australia if you choose to leave. If you plan to leave Australia and want to return, apply for a Return Resident visa before you leave.

If you are outside Australia when your application to renounce Australian citizenship is approved, and you wish to travel to Australia, you will need to apply for a visa that suits your circumstances.

阿天的目標是未來可獲得澳洲永居，在找工作上，他不介意從事城市規劃以外的工作，「因為在這段時間都很難找到城市規劃的工作，而這行業很多時都受聘於政府，故申請者須是澳洲公民」，他說即使這行業被列入指定職業清單，但事實上很多時要有公民身份才找到工作。他聽說即使有人獲得推薦，也因為並非澳洲公民而受到限制，而且競爭十分激烈，「為甚麼不請一個本地人，英文一定沒有問題，而是去找你，這是很多國際學生輸蝕的地方」。

岩岩見到Tasmania update 左491同190資料。請問offshore applicants 可以申請嗎？

I am visiting Australia temporality on a non-resident visa. Can I apply for nomination for the overseas applicant categories?
I was in Australia temporarily last year, can I still apply?
The overseas applicant categories (3A TSOL and 3B Job Offer) require applicants to be currently living overseas and not have lived in another part of Australia within the last 12 months. If you are only a short term visitor and your visa does not allow employment you are eligible to apply. We may ask you for more information to show that you have not been living and working in Australia.
